caption.title: Geographic distribution of MAYV and CHIKV seroprevalence.
caption.p: a Three regions of French Guiana with distinct epidemiological characteristics are derived using the model estimates. b, MAYV and c, CHIKV seroprevalence estimated using the model-based classification (Maroni, n = 618; Coast, n = 1919, Interior, n = 160, Total, n = 2697). Points and error bars indicate the mean and 95% confidence intervals of the weighted seroprevalence, respectively.
